mapper.select: SELECT * FROM image_room WHERE image_room_deldate IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_room(image_room_no, image_room_name, emp_no) VALUES(#{image_room_no}, #{image_room_name}, #{emp_no})
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.dept_no, e.office_no, e.emp_superior, e.emp_reporter, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_id, e.emp_password, e.emp_address, e.emp_approvalYN, e.emp_residentnumber, e.emp_hiredate, e.emp_resigndate, e.emp_email_sign, e.emp_elec_auth_signkey, e.emp_img, e.emp_elec_auth_img, p.position_name, d.dept_name, o.office_name FROM emp e, position p, dept d, office o WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.position_no = p.position_no AND e.office_no = o.office_no AND e.emp_resigndate IS NULL AND e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
